ListPreference.android:title: Logging precision
ListPreference.android:summary: The size of interval between GPS fixes.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Target waypoint time interval in minutes
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The time the GPS receiver should sleep between waypoints.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Target waypoint distance in meters
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The distance that should be covered between waypoints.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Speed and altitude sanity check
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only accept reasonable GPS speeds and altitudes

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Monitor GPS status
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Displays the number of satellites used and sounds alarm on poor signal.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable screen blanking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Keeps the screen on during tracking.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable screen dimming
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Keeps the screen on full brightness during tracking.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start up at boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: After starting the device, the logging service starts.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Log at service start
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: After starting, the logging service immediately records.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Log at car docking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: After inserting in a car dock, the logging immediately records.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Stop logging at undocking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: After exiting a dock, the logging immediately stops.

ListPreference.android:title: Map provider
ListPreference.android:summary: The source from which to retrieve mapdata.

ListPreference.android:title: Track color
ListPreference.android:summary: The coloring used to draw the track.
Determine if metric or imperial units are used

EditTextPreference.android:title: Implement width
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Width of the implement the tractor is pulling
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage:
"The width of the implement the tractor is pulling or other machine that works/covers an area over a given time. For example, width of a swather.
Enter number of feet for acres/hour or meters for use in hectares/hour. "

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: GPS speed
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the speed from the last received GPS fix.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: GPS altitude
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the altitude from the last received GPS fix.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Distance covered
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the distance covered by the track.
Show a compass with a needle pointing north

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: My location
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show my location on the map

EditTextPreference.android:title: Jogmap upload code
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The authentication code to upload to a jogmap.de account
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: "Please enter the Zugangskey obtained from http://www.jogmap.de/civic4/?q=mobilinfo. "

ListPreference.android:title: The public visibility of GPS traces on openstreetmap.org
ListPreference.android:summary: Please consult the openstreetmap.org wiki for more information about the visibility levels.

EditTextPreference.android:title: SD-Card directory used to store shared tracks.
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Created track and media files are stored in this SD-Card directory.
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: "Enter the path added to the SD-Card path to use for files. For instance the default /OpenGPSTracker/ will add a single directory to the SD-Card and /Apps/OpenGPSTracker/ will nest the two. "

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum time between broadcasts
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Number of minutes after which new progress is broadcasted
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Number of minutes after which new progress is broadcasted

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum distance between broadcasts
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Number of miles or kilometers after which new progress is broadcasted
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Number of miles or kilometers after which new progress is broadcasted

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Stream to audio voice-over
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Each progress broadcast gets a spoken summary

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Stream to custom web server
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Upload track progress to (personal) web server

EditTextPreference.android:title: Custom web server URL
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The web address to which to upload progress
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: A HTTP GET requests is send for each stream broadcast. This URL is used for that request. In this URL the placeholders are replaced with actual information. The possible placeholders are @LAT@, @LON@, @ALT@, @ACC@, @SPEED@, @BEAR@, @TIME@ and @ID@.

EditTextPreference.android:title: On failure keep a backlog
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The queue size of the backlog of requests
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Enter the number of requests that are cached in a backlog queue when requests do not reach the custom server URL

TextView.android:text: Sharing creates a track export with as much of the recorded data as possible.
An application that can record, by GPS, the travels of your device.
